# FootDash Project Instructions

## Project Overview
FootDash is a football/soccer dashboard application. This guide contains essential information for AI agents working with this codebase.

## Project Structure
The project follows a typical modern web application structure:

```
FootDash/
├── .github/           # GitHub related files and configurations
├── src/              # Source code
└── README.md         # Project documentation
```
